page.title: 14HOBBIES AND PASTIMES SURVEY
page.content:
Please specify which hobbies and pastimes members of your household practise regularly.
All of the activities mentioned were home based. By far the largest number of respondents said that they considered gardening as a hobby (13 of 33 replies) but as all respondents owned a good sized garden this was not surprising. Reading was the next most popular pastime (4) followed by knitting (3), painting and Do-it-yourself (2). Other pastimes included sewing, cookery, chair-caning, playing piano and crosswords.
